alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 28 at 1:57PM MST until August 28 at 4:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 157 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain on County Road 193 between Blake Ranch Road and Highway 93. Radar estimated between 1 and 2 inches of rain had fallen. Flash flooding is occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Blake Ranch Road and DW Ranch Road. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 66 and 78. This includes the following streams and drainages... McGarrys Wash, Frees Wash, Peacock Wash, Knight Creek, Antelope Wash, Bottleneck Wash, Wheeler Wash and Kabba Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
